caption:
This photograph captures an industrial scene that features a large chemical plant set against a natural environment. The plant, located close to a body of water, consists of various structures including several towering distillation columns, large storage tanks, and extensive piping throughout. Visible emissions from the complex include white steam and smoke released from stacks and a bright orange flame from a flare stack, indicating ongoing chemical processes.

The background is dominated by a dense, lush green forest on a hill, providing a stark contrast to the industrial foreground. This juxtaposition highlights the interaction between industrial development and nature. The water in the foreground appears calm, reflecting some elements of the plant, emphasizing the plant's proximity to the natural water source.

No human figures are visible in the scene, focusing the viewerâ€™s attention solely on the industrial operations and their environmental context. The lighting suggests that the photo was taken on a clear day, as the sky appears bright and there are no signs of overcast conditions, which adds to the vividness of the colors in the image. The overall composition encapsulates themes of industry, environment, and the impact of human activities on natural landscapes.
title: The E.I. DuPont de Nemours Belle Works on the Kanawha River photograph was taken from Marmet on the other side of the Kanawha.
